en-US.description: Callback for full display of buttons on either side

zh-CN.description: 当 close 从 false 变为 true 时，会隐藏所有侧滑操作按钮。反过来 true 变为 false 无任何变化。

en-US.description: When close changes from false to true, all sideslip operation buttons are hidden. Conversely, true changes to false without any change.

SwitchButtonProps.name: theme
SwitchButtonProps.types: {  width?: number;  height?: number;  thumbSize?: number;  margin?: number | number[];  tintColor?: string | {    [key: string]: string;  };  onTintColor?: string;  thumbTintColor?: string;  onThumbTintColor?: string;}

en-US.description: Specify the style of the container that wraps the SwitchButton

zh-CN.description: 当前选中的值，设置了该属性即为受控组件

en-US.description: The currently selected value. After this property is set, it is a controlled component.

SwitchButtonProps.name: size
SwitchButtonProps.types: {  width?: number;  height?: number;  activeSize?: number;  margin?: number;}

en-US.description: Set the size of the development component

zh-CN.description: 改变 SwitchButton 值时执行此回调

en-US.description: This callback is executed when the switch combination value is changed.

zh-CN.description: 设置当 SwitchButton的 value 为 false 时背景颜色

en-US.description: Set the background color when the value of the SwitchButton is false.

zh-CN.description: 设置当 SwitchButton的 value 为 true 时颜色

en-US.description: Set the color when the value of the SwitchButton is true.

zh-CN.description: 设置当 SwitchButton 的 value 为 false 时 thumb 颜色

en-US.description: Set the color of the sliding button when the value of the SwitchButton is false.

zh-CN.description: 设置当 SwitchButton 的 value 为 true 时 thumb 颜色，若没有设置则为 thumbTintColor 的值

en-US.description: Set the color of the sliding button when the value of the SwitchButton is true. It is the value of thumbTintColor if it is not set.

zh-CN.description: 设置当 SwitchButton 的 value 为 false 时边框颜色 当 SwitchButton 的 value 为 true 时边框颜色等于 onTintColor

en-US.description: Set the color of the border when the value of the sliding button is false.
Specify the style of the icon used for dragging in the switch.

zh-CN.description: SwitchButton 的 value 值为 false 时左侧显示的字符，超过 3 个字符则显示显示 2 个字符，其余显示…

en-US.description: When the value of SwitchButton is false, the characters displayed on the left side are displayed. If the value exceeds 3 characters, 2 characters are displayed, and the rest are displayed ...

zh-CN.description: SwitchButton 的 value 值为 true 时右侧显示的字符，超过 3 个字符则显示显示 2 个字符，其余显示…

en-US.description: When the value of SwitchButton is true, the characters displayed on the right side are displayed. If the value exceeds 3 characters, 2 characters are displayed, and the rest are displayed ...

zh-CN.description: SwitchButton 的 value 值为 true 时右侧显示的字符样式

en-US.description: The character style displayed on the right when the value of SwitchButton is true

zh-CN.description: Switch 开关类型，默认不传，特殊情况传值 thumbMore

zh-CN.description: 当 switchType = 'thumbMore' 时，开关左右定位的滑块样式

en-US.description: When switchType = 'thumbMore', the slider style for the left and right positioning of the switch
